characters: Group of people, white van, red truck, bus
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching a group of people standing in the middle of the road. A white van is on the right side, a red truck is on the left side, and a bus is approaching from the right side. The group of people is standing in the middle of the road, potentially blocking the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down to avoid a collision with the group of people standing in the middle of the road. The vehicle is also maintaining a safe distance from the white van on the right and the red truck on the left.
key_objects: 1) Front: Group of people, approximately 10 meters away, standing in the middle of the road, blocking the vehicles path. 2) Right: White van, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 3) Left: Red truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 4) Right: Bus, approximately 15 meters away, approaching the vehicles path.
